keyMoments.title: Marguerite Discovers Luffy
keyMoments.description: Marguerite, along with Sweet Pea and Aphelandra, discovers Luffy unconscious and covered in parasitic mushrooms. She identifies them as 'Mushrooms-Growing-Out-of-Your-Body' Mushrooms and recognizes the danger to his life.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Marguerite, who will become one of Luffy's primary allies on Amazon Lily. Her compassion and medical knowledge are immediately established.
keyMoments.quote: These are 'Mushrooms-Growing-Out-of-Your-Body' Mushrooms! They can suck the life force out of the victim if they remain!

relationships.description: Marguerite is one of the first Kuja warriors to encounter Luffy and shows immediate compassion by helping save his life from the parasitic mushrooms.

evolutionMoments.description: Marguerite discovers Luffy covered in mushrooms and brings him to the village for treatment.

relationships.description: Marguerite works alongside Sweet Pea as a fellow Kuja warrior.
Marguerite works alongside Aphelandra as a fellow Kuja warrior.

reveals.information: Member of the Kuja warrior tribe on Amazon Lily
Has knowledge of the island's flora and fauna, including dangerous parasitic mushrooms

keyMoments.title: Sweet Pea Discovers Luffy
keyMoments.description: Sweet Pea accompanies Marguerite and Aphelandra when they discover Luffy covered in mushrooms. She helps bring him back to the village for treatment.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Sweet Pea as one of the trio of Kuja warriors who discover Luffy.
keyMoments.quote: What is that?! A person covered in mushrooms!

keyMoments.title: Sweet Pea's Innocent Discovery
keyMoments.description: During Luffy's bath, Sweet Pea notices what she thinks is another mushroom between his legs that won't come off, leading to the revelation of his gender.
keyMoments.significance: Sweet Pea's innocent observation leads to the discovery of Luffy's gender, creating the central conflict of the arc. This moment highlights the Kuja's complete lack of knowledge about men.
keyMoments.quote: There's another mushroom here that won't come off!

relationships.description: Sweet Pea helps rescue Luffy when he is found covered in parasitic mushrooms.
Sweet Pea works alongside Marguerite as a fellow Kuja warrior.
Sweet Pea works alongside Aphelandra as a fellow Kuja warrior.

reveals.information: Member of the Kuja warrior tribe on Amazon Lily

keyMoments.title: Aphelandra Discovers Luffy
keyMoments.description: Aphelandra accompanies Marguerite and Sweet Pea when they discover Luffy covered in mushrooms. Being significantly taller than the others, she helps carry Luffy back to the village.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Aphelandra, notable for her unusual height among the Kuja warriors.

relationships.description: Aphelandra helps rescue Luffy when he is found covered in parasitic mushrooms.
Aphelandra works alongside Marguerite as a fellow Kuja warrior.
Aphelandra works alongside Sweet Pea as a fellow Kuja warrior.

reveals.information: Member of the Kuja warrior tribe on Amazon Lily
Notably tall for a Kuja warrior at 271 cm

keyMoments.title: Elder Nyon's Debut and Recognition
keyMoments.description: Gloriosa (Elder Nyon) arrives during Luffy's treatment and immediately recognizes what the other Kuja cannot - that the visitor is male. Her worldly knowledge sets her apart from the isolated Kuja.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the wise elder character who has knowledge of the outside world and men, making her crucial for bridging the gap between Luffy and the Kuja society.
keyMoments.quote: You fools! That's not a mushroom! This person... is a man!

reveals.information: Former empress of Amazon Lily from three generations prior to Boa Hancock
Has knowledge of the outside world and men, unlike most Kuja warriors

keyMoments.title: Belladonna's Medical Treatment
keyMoments.description: Belladonna arrives to treat Luffy's mushroom infection, directing the Kuja to pull out the mushrooms and burn the remaining stems to prevent regrowth.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Belladonna as the medical expert of the Kuja tribe, demonstrating the tribe's capability and organization.
keyMoments.quote: Pull them out one by one, then burn the stems that remain. We need to remove all traces or they'll grow back.

reveals.information: Medical expert among the Kuja tribe

keyMoments.title: Kikyo Appears in the Crowd
keyMoments.description: Kikyo is present among the gathered Kuja warriors witnessing Luffy's treatment and the revelation of his gender.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Kikyo as a member of the Kuja tribe.

reveals.information: Member of the Kuja warrior tribe on Amazon Lily

keyMoments.title: Nerine Appears in the Crowd
keyMoments.description: Nerine is present among the gathered Kuja warriors witnessing Luffy's treatment and the revelation of his gender.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Nerine as a member of the Kuja tribe.

reveals.information: Member of the Kuja warrior tribe on Amazon Lily

keyMoments.title: Luffy Lands on Amazon Lily
keyMoments.description: After being sent flying by Kuma's powers, Luffy crashes onto Amazon Lily after three days of travel, landing in the middle of a giant paw print. He immediately begins searching for his scattered crew.
keyMoments.significance: This marks a major turning point for Luffy as he is completely alone for the first time in the series, separated from all his crew members.
keyMoments.quote: Where am I? And where's everyone else?!

keyMoments.title: Luffy Eats Parasitic Mushrooms
keyMoments.description: Driven by hunger, Luffy finds and eats various mushrooms that cause different emotional reactions, not realizing they are parasitic 'Body Mushrooms' that will drain his life force.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's reckless eating habits while also setting up his rescue by the Kuja warriors. His unconscious state allows the gender reveal to occur.
keyMoments.quote: These mushrooms are amazing! Each one makes me feel totally different!

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Gender Discovered
keyMoments.description: While unconscious and being bathed by the Kuja women, Luffy's male anatomy is discovered, shocking the all-female society of Amazon Lily where men are forbidden.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the central conflict of the Amazon Lily Arc - Luffy must survive on an island where his very existence violates their sacred laws.
